cast.name: 斯特凡·奥比尔 Stéphane Aubier
文森特·帕塔尔 Vincent Patar

this_title: Les Grandes Vacances de Cowboy et Indien
trans_title: 牛仔和印第安人的悠长假期
introduction: Chic! The summer vacation time has come for Cowboy, Indian and Horse! But even though they have barely started, the three friends are already bored. Fortunately, a trip to the cinema will give them a little imagination and a good dose of energy to start building… a boat! The summer adventure begins!
chinese_title: 牛仔和印第安人的悠长假期
foreign_title: Les Grandes Vacances de Cowboy et Indien
